title: In The End
lyrics:
[intro-kazoo] (Em)  (Bm)  (Cmaj7)  (D-stop)
 
It starts with…  
(Em)One thing I don’t know why
It (Bm)doesn’t even matter how hard you try
(Cmaj7)Keep that in mind, I designed this rhyme
To ex(D)plain in due time
 
All I (Em)know… time is a valuable thing
(Bm)Watch it fly by as the pendulum swings
(Cmaj7)Watch it count down to the end of the day
The clock (D)ticks life away
 
It’s so un(Em)real…   didn’t look out below
(Bm)Watch the time go right out the window
(Cmaj7)Trying to hold on, but you didn’t even know
I (D)wasted it all just to… 
 
Watch you (Em)go… I kept everything inside
And even (Bm)though I tried, it all fell apart
(Cmaj7)What it meant to me will eventually
Be a (D)memory of a time when…
 
[chorus]
I tried so (Em)hard and got so (G)far
But in the (D)end it doesn’t even (C)matter
I had to (Em)fall to lose it (G)all
But in the (D)end it doesn’t even (C)matter
 
(Em)One thing, I don’t know why
It (Bm)doesn’t even matter how hard you try
(Cmaj7)Keep that in mind, I designed this rhyme
To re(D)mind myself how…
 
I tried so (Em)hard…  In spite of the way you were mocking me
(Bm) Acting like I was part of your property
(Cmaj7) Remembering all the times you fought with me
(D) I’m surprised it got so… far
 
(Em)Things aren’t the way they were before
(Bm) You wouldn’t even recognize me anymore
(Cmaj7) Not that you knew me back then
But it (D)all comes back to me
 
In the (Em)end… You kept everything inside
And even (Bm)though I tried, it all fell apart
(Cmaj7)What it meant to me will eventually
Be a me(D)mory of a time when…
 
[chorus]
I tried so (Em)hard and got so (G)far
But in the (D)end it doesn’t even (C)matter
I had to (Em)fall to lose it (G)all
But in the (D)end it doesn’t even (C)matter (C)
 
[bridge]
I’ve put my (Em)trust in (Bm)you
Pushed as (Cmaj7)far as I can (D)go
For all (Em)this
There’s only (Bm)one thing you should (Cmaj7)know (D-stop)
 
I’ve put my (Em)trust in (Bm)you
Pushed as (Cmaj7)far as I can (D)go
For all (Em)this
There’s only (Bm)one thing you should (Cmaj7)know (D)
 
[chorus]
I tried so (Em)hard and got so (G)far
But in the (D)end it doesn’t even (C)matter
I had to (Em)fall to lose it (G)all
But in the (D)end it doesn’t even (C)matter
 
[outro-kazoo]
(Em)  (Bm)  (Cmaj7)  (D)  x2
(Em-single strum) [end]
